dialogue.speaker: senpai-remnants-angry
text: Not bad for an ugly worm.

dialogue.speaker: senpai-remnants-angry
text: But this time I'll rip your nuts off right after your girlfriend finishes gargling mine.

dialogue.speaker: bf-pixel-remnants
text: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground.
